sqlQuery.name: GroupAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select og.group_id as group_name, og.group_id as old_group_name from apidb.orthologgroup og

sqlQuery.name: ByNameList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE lower(og.group_id) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT lower(gm.new_group_id) AS group_id FROM apidb.GroupMapping gm JOIN ( $$group_names$$ ) AS ds(group_name) ON lower(gm.old_group_id) = lower(ds.group_name) )

sqlQuery.name: ByPfamIdOrKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT domain.group_name FROM (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct full_id) as num_proteins FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment WHERE group_name IS NOT NULL AND (accession LIKE UPPER(REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) -- OR symbol LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%') OR description LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) GROUP BY group_name ) domain, apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.group_id = domain.group_name AND domain.num_proteins >= $$min_num_proteins$$ AND (domain.num_proteins / og.number_of_members) >= $$min_fraction_proteins$$

sqlQuery.name: ByKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa JOIN dots.AaSequenceImp asi ON sa.aa_sequence_id = asi.aa_sequence_id WHERE asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND POSITION($$keyword$$ IN asi.description) > 0

sqlQuery.name: BySequenceCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name, og.number_of_core_members AS core_num, og.number_of_peripheral_members AS peripheral_num FROM apidb.orthologgroup og WHERE og.number_of_core_members >= $$core_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_core_members <= $$core_count_max$$ AND og.number_of_peripheral_members >= $$peripheral_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_peripheral_members <= $$peripheral_count_max$$ AND og.number_of_members >= $$all_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_members <= $$all_count_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByGenomeCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT group_name, core_count, peripheral_count, core_count + peripheral_count AS all_count FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN c.group_name IS NULL THEN p.group_name ELSE c.group_name END AS group_name, CASE WHEN c.core_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.core_count END AS core_count, CASE WHEN p.peripheral_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE p.peripheral_count END AS peripheral_count FROM ( SELECT group_name, COUNT(DISTINCT taxon_abbreviation) AS core_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral = 'C' GROUP BY group_name ) c FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT group_name, COUNT(DISTINCT taxon_abbreviation) AS peripheral_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral = 'P' GROUP BY group_name ) p ON c.group_name = p.group_name ) subquery WHERE core_count >= $$core_taxon_min$$ AND core_count <= $$core_taxon_max$$ AND peripheral_count >= $$peripheral_taxon_min$$ AND peripheral_count <= $$peripheral_taxon_max$$ AND (core_count + peripheral_count) >= $$all_taxon_min$$ AND (core_count + peripheral_count) <= $$all_taxon_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentIdentity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroupStats ogs WHERE ogs.stat_Type = 'median' AND ogs.evalue >= $$percent_min$$ AND ogs.evalue <= $$percent_max$$ AND protein_subset IN ('C+P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPhyleticPattern
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.group_id = ANY($$phyletic_expression$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByEcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sec.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.sequenceenzymeclass sec WHERE ( sec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_number_type_ahead$$), ' ', ''), '-', '%') OR sec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_wildcard$$), ' ', ''), '-', '%'), '*', '%') OR sec.description LIKE REPLACE($$ec_wildcard$$, '*', '%') )

sqlQuery.name: FromSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.group_name, SUM(answer.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa JOIN ($$sequence_answer$$) answer ON sa.full_id = answer.full_id GROUP BY sa.group_name

sqlQuery.name: AllGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og
